instructions: place the charger plate on bottom half of the dinner table
place the fork to the left of the charger plate with prongs placed vertically
place the knife to the right of the charger plate with the blade facing the left
place the salad for on the left of charger plate, left of the dinner fork
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with blade facing the left
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife vertically
place the dessert spoon horizontally above the charger plate with the bowl facing the left
place the dessert fork horizontally between charger plate and dessert spoon prongs facing the right
place bread plater above the salad fork and left of the dessert spoon
place the butter knife on top of the bread plate diagonally
place the water glass above the salad knife and right of the dessert fork
place the napkin on top of the plate
